title: Bella Sara
description:
Based on the hugely successful trading card and website series for girls, Bella Sara will immerse the player in a world filled with fantasy horses. Players will be able to ride, care for, accessorize and trade horses with friends over Wi-Fi while discovering secret items, exclusive cards and codes to activate on the official website..
    *  Explore the Magical North of North ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã¢â‚¬Å“ Players can care for and ride six magical horses from the Bella Sara collection, including one horse unique to the game. Players will be able to dress their character and horses, choosing from many different combinations of outfits and equipment.
    * Game-Exclusive Content - Featuring cards and items exclusive to the game, players will be able to build a virtual Bella Sara card collection and trade cards with friends over Wi-Fi.
    * Compatible with Official Website- Bella Sara has gameplay elements compatible with the official website.
    *  Windows XP/Vista
    * Memory: 256 (minimum); 512+ (recommended) MB RAM
    * Processor: 1.2GHz MHz or faster
    * DirectX: 8 (minimum); 9.0c+ (recommended)
    * Internet: Internet connection is required to register both the download and CD-ROM versions of the game
